publications.name: Automatic processing and analysis of the quality healing of derma injury
publications.publisher: Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing
publications.summary: Analyze of the microscopeâ€™s bitmaps is usual task in biology. To illustrate the proposed method we used analyzing collagen in dermis snapshots. Methodic to automatic analyses of microscope snapshots is presented.

publications.name: Building the inhomogeneous finite element model by the data of computed tomography
publications.summary: The aim of the work is to reveal a methodology for constructing a finite element model by tomography data. To evaluate the model, calculations of the femur were carried out.
